title: Men who molest
brief_description: This program is an investigation of four men who have exhibited a range of molestation behaviour. Three of them are in treatment at the largest American community-based facility. The documentary examines the therapy that these men undergo in an attempt to control their behaviour and it emphasises the importance of therapy for this complex social problem.
